heroDescription: A Next.js SaaS boilerplate with authentication, subscriptions, and a beautiful UI. Built with Next.js, NextAuth.js, Stripe, and Tailwind CSS.
feature1Description: Leverage the power of modern web technologies for optimal performance and developer experience.
feature2Description: Robust database solution with an intuitive ORM for efficient data management and scalability.
feature3Description: Seamless payment processing and subscription management with industry-leading Stripe integration.
ctaDescription: Explore the codebase on GitHub or deploy your own instance today.
title: Dashboard
unexpectedErrorFetchingStats: An unexpected error occurred while fetching stats
unexpectedErrorFetchingActivities: An unexpected error occurred while fetching activities
totalRolesDescription: Number of roles defined in the system
totalPermissionsDescription: Number of permissions defined in the system
roleManagementDescription: Manage user roles in the system
